fg_menu_first0.content: Help us build a pinkaperfect house for each fairy!

fg_menu_return.content: Welcome back to Fairyland! Letâ€™s keep designing!

fg_menu_first1.content: Tap an empty circle to build a fairy house there!

fg_menu_arrow.content: Tap the arrow to see more of Fairyland!

fg_menu_house0.content: Fairyland is looking even more magical now!

fg_menu_house1.content: Fairyland looks pinkamazing with our new fairy house!

fg_menu_house2.content: Look! There are so many beautiful things in Fairyland now!

fg_menu_house3.content: Pinkcredible! I wish I could stay in Fairyland forever!

fg_menu_full.content: You built houses for all the fairies in Fairyland!
Tap any house you made to keep building or start it over.

fg_menu_full_edit2.content: Wow, I love what you designed!

fg_menu_edit.content: You can also tap a house to keep building it or start it over.

fg_menu_eastereggs_alt.content: Tap around Fairyland to see some surprises!

fg_menu_progress.content: Tap an empty circle to build a new house,
or tap a house you already made to keep building it!

fg_popup_edit.content: Do you want to keep building this house or start it over?

fg_popup_delete.content: Are you sure you want to start this house over?
Tap here to go back, or tap here to start it over.

fg_reset_alt.content: Do you want to start all of your houses over, or go back to Fairyland?

fg_reset.content: Do you want to start all over?
Tap here to start over or tap here to keep your houses.

fg_reset_back.content: Let's keep building! Tap any house.

fg_selection_first0.content: Choose one of these fantastic fairies to build a house for!

fg_selection_second.content: Choose another fantastic fairy, or build a house for a surprise fairy!

fg_selection_fairies_inactive.content: You already built a house for that fairy!

fg_selection_surprise_inactive.content: You already found all of the surprise fairies!

fg_intro_butterfly.content: The Butterfly Fairy loves to decorate with acorns and anything pink!

fg_intro_pantonio.content: Pantonio loves to decorate with mushrooms and anything orange.

fg_intro_sarafina.content: Sarafina loves to decorate with white flowers and anything red!

fg_intro_perseus.content: Perseus loves to decorate with sticks and anything yellow!

fg_intro_fairyanna.content: Fairyanna loves to decorate with stones and anything purple!

fg_intro_birthday.content: The Birthday Fairy loves to decorate with hearts and anything green!

fg_intro_felix.content: Felix the Frost Fairy loves to decorate with stars and anything blue!

fg_intro_checkmark.content: Tap the checkmark to start building the house!

fg_build_intro_butterfly.content: Let's build a pinkatastic house that's just right for the Butterfly Fairy!

fg_build_intro_pantonio.content: Let's build a pinkamazing house that Pantonio will love!

fg_build_intro_perseus.content: Let's build a pinkamazing house that Perseus will love!

fg_build_intro_birthday.content: Let's build a pinkatastic house that's just right for the Birthday Fairy!

fg_build_decorations_she.content: Great! You can add anything you'd like to the house!
The fairy will show up when you add both things she especially loves!

fg_build_decorations_he.content: Great! You can add anything you'd like to the house!
The fairy will show up when you add both things he especially loves!

fg_build_shape.content: Tap here to choose a shape for your house!

fg_build_shape_react1.content: This house is gonna be awesome!
